message: Accept my generous offer and we can shake on it!
A more balanced offer, let's meet in the middle!
Meet me halfway, but I'm willing to give you a bit more!
I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to compromise!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting desperate, but I'm willing to take a risk!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing!
I'm not backing down, Alice. I'll take control of the negotiations!
I'll give you the majority, but don't think you're getting the best deal!
I'll take the minority share, but I'm still in control!
